mean_cn: n. 耙子，耙机；  v. 耙，搜索，探索
mean_en: a tool that has a series of metal, wooden, or plastic pieces at the end of a long handle and that is used to gather leaves, break apart soil, make ground smooth, etc.
sentence: He is raking up the golden leaves on an autumn morning.
sentence_trans: 在秋日的清晨，他用耙子清扫金色的落叶。
